column1: Note: This worksheet removes the old electricity supply sector and creates a new supply sector.
The new supply sector has the same name so that no changes are needed end-use technologies
It simply aggregates the 4 electricity generation time periods
This worksheet also creates four demand sectors
These sectors divide generated electricity for the four demand time blocks (off-peak, intermediate, subpeak, and peak)
For average cost pricing, set include-subsector to all 1's

column2: Coefficients based on historical calibration data
